definition.sentence: The MNLG is deployed as part of the NECA system which generates dialogues between animated agents .
† A SPEECH SYNTHESIS MODULE , which adds information for Speech .
† A GESTURE ASSIGNMENT MODULE , which controls the temporal coordination of gestures and speech .
definition.definiens: controls the temporal coordination of gestures and speech

definition.sentence: † A PLAYER , which plays the animated characters and the corresponding speech sound files .
definition.definiens: plays the animated characters and the corresponding speech sound files

definition.sentence: The NECA MNLG adopts the conventional pipeline architecture for generators ( Reiter and Dale , 2000 ) .
definition.definiens: adopts the conventional pipeline architecture for generators

definition.sentence: The input to the MNLG is a node ( i.e. , feature structure ) stipulating the syntactic type of the output ( e.g. , sentence : < s ) , semantics and further information on the current dialogue act in PROFIT:2 ( < s & sem !
definition.definiens: a node ( i.e. , feature structure ) stipulating the syntactic type of the output ( e.g. , sentence : < s ) , semantics and further information on the current dialogue act in PROFIT:2

definition.sentence: For this purpose , the MNLG tries to match the input node with the mother node of one of the trees in its tree repository .
definition.definiens: tries to match the input node with the mother node of one of the trees in its tree repository

definition.sentence: Lexicalization subsequently yields expressions such as ‘it’ ( empty descriptive content ) or , for instance , ‘the red car’ .
definition.definiens: ‘it’ ( empty descriptive content ) or , for instance , ‘the red car’

definition.sentence: Where SPEAKER is a variable which is bound to the name of the speaker of the utterance .
definition.definiens: a variable which is bound to the name of the speaker of the utterance
